attributes.action: make Pension Credits available to all OAP's without means testing the same as Child Benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government recognised the OAP's basic pension was too low the minute they introduced Pension Credits otherwise why did they introduce it. Having established the Basic Pension was too low surely the same applies to all OAP's and not only those that didn't work or those that worked but did not provide a little extra for themselves. Please remember that Incapacity is a different matter and should be treated in a generous and separate way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
